bug.short_desc: need to do a win32 port of SASLv2

long_desc.thetext: (this is relatively trivial to fix, but not worth it until we start working on the Win 32 port)
Created an attachment (id=79) alexey's patch file (zip format)
Created an attachment (id=80) alexey's patch file (diff format)
Created an attachment (id=81) alexey's original message.

this is now well along the way. it now compiles again using workspaces. KERBEROS_V4, GSSAPI, and the sasldb plugins don't yet work, but hopefully I will get to them soon.
i'm also going to generate a set of NMake files, since using project files makes it too hard to work with both VS6 and VS7. i'll probably have VS6 auto-generate them and then do some amount of massaging by hand.
marking as a target for 2.1.11, since we're not going to make the very next release.
Larry, can we close this? Or do you still have some bits left?

alexey has some more issues, but we can open new bugs for that. the initial port is done, at least.
i'll also file bugs for the kerberos mechs.
